name: rag-lite-ts

scripts.test: npm run build:test && node --test dist/text/tokenizer.test.js dist/core/chunker.test.js dist/text/embedder.test.js dist/core/vector-index.test.js dist/index-manager.test.js dist/core/search.test.js dist/file-processor.test.js dist/mcp-server.test.js dist/preprocess.test.js dist/core/config.test.js dist/preprocessors/integration.test.js dist/cli/cli.test.js
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && npm run build:test && node --test dist/integration.test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:integration
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
